name: Enshrined
description:
Gameplay

As the owner of a fine art gallery, customers are constantly trying to sell you their art. Unfortunately, many will try scamming you. Research the authenticity of various pieces of valuable art to determine what is real or fake.

Each customer pays an entry fee to enter your gallery. The more valuable authentic art you have, the more money you will make per customer.

Fake art is visually distinguishable from real art, so carefully examine each piece of art before purchasing it!

Some customers are willing to negotiate on their offered price. Some, however, will take offense at the prospect of selling for lower than what they asked.

Collect all seven pieces of authentic art to win!

Controls

This game is played entirely with your mouse.

Game Jam Submission

This game was created for submission to Code Jam 1, hosted by Theory of Everything.
